titleStmt.title: A briefe report of the militarie seruices done in the Low Countries, by the Erle of Leicester: written by one that serued in good place there in a letter to a friend of his
titleStmt.author: Digges, Thomas, d. 1595.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Arnold Hatfield, for Gregorie Seton,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: T.D., i.e. Thomas Digges. Another edition (STC 7285) is unsigned.
Item at reel 289:9 identified as STC 7285.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and Harvard University Library.
